This blog is built by Yinghe Liu, first launched in Dec 28th, 2023. He's currently a student major in psychology and passioned in how human react in stressful situations. He's also a gamer and a big fan of the game of GO. He built this blog to record his life and share thoughts. It may not be updated frequently, but he will try his best to keep it alive.
